characters.name: Kusuo Saiki
characters.description:
**Height:** 167 cm

Saiki has an extremely uncaring, neutral personality. As a gifted psychic that can do anything he wants, he has long stopped caring about the world; however, he has shown to be extremely cautious, as he often runs from Nendou, the only person he fears and is prone to immediately teleporting to faraway places upon spotting an insect. Saiki has a sweet tooth, so he loves sweets, especially Coffee Jelly.

Fourteen days after his birth, Kusuo uttered his first word without moving his mouth and 1 month after birth he took his first step in midair. At the age of 1 was the first time Kusuo has voluntarily used his abilities, when his mother said they were out of mirin, Kusuo teleported away and returned with several bottles of mirin.

Saiki is a gifted psychic. Having obtained his powers since birth, the first signs of Saiki's powers came from when he was able to hear the voices of his parents and he subsequently telepathically spoke back to them. Two months later, he demonstrated the ability to walk in the air. Saiki has stated that in three days, he can wipe out humanity. The full extent of all of his abilities is unknown.

characters.name: Riki Nendou
characters.description:
Nendo has a simple way of thinking, but because of it, Saiki is unable to read his mind. Because Saiki is unable to detect Nendo's presence, Nendo is the only person who is able to sneak up on Saiki and making him think he will someday be a dangerous foe.

Nendo believes he is a friend of Saiki, but this is definitely not the case as Saiki despises Nendo. Saiki would often compare Nendo to a bug, as bugs are one of the few animals that Saiki cannot read the minds of.

characters.name: Kokomi Teruhashi
characters.description: Kokomi Teruhashi is a student in Kusuo's class, considered very attractive by both women and men, who often stop and stare upon seeing her.

characters.name: Shun Kaidou
characters.description: Shun is a young man who considers himself to be the "Jet-Black Wing", a lone hero fighting against the evil organization Dark Reunion. He also believes his powers stem from a dark being living within his arm. To his friends and peers, including Saiki, he's simply an immature kid playing a game that only he understands.

characters.name: Reita Toritsuka
characters.description: Another psychic and one of two people outside of Saiki's family to know of his abilities. He has the ability to see spirits and is haunted by the ghost of Nendou's late father, but is only interested in using his ability to attract girls.

characters.name: Kineshi Hairo
characters.description: An overly hot-blooded, energetic, passionate student who enjoys sports and is constantly trying to get other people motivated. He is also Saiki's class representative, but due to his nature, he is well-trusted by his classmates.

characters.name: Aren Kuboyasu
characters.description:
Kuboyasu in his previous school wore the typical delinquent clothes. He sported a pompadour hairstyle, and wore a modified school uniform with his pants looking more like an over-sized skirt. After moving to PK Academy, Kuboyasu changed his looks into more of a normal student like wearing glasses and dyeing his hair dark violet. In school, he wears the standard uniform of male students in PK Academy while in days off, he wears long sleeves; possibly to hide his scars which were first seen by Kaidou.

(Source: Saiki Kusuo no Psi Nan Wikia)

characters.name: Kuniharu Saiki
characters.description:
Kuniharu Saiki is the father of Kusuo and Kusuke and the husband of Kurumi. 

(Source: Saiki Kusuo no Sai Nan Wikia)

characters.name: Kurumi Saiki
characters.description: Kurumi Saiki is Saiki's lovely mother.

characters.name: Chiyo Yumehara
characters.description: A romantic and dreamy girl who easily falls in love with boys. She originally has a crush on Kusuo and tried her best to appeal to Kusuo. Kusuo in turn rejected her as hard as he could with his PSI powers. Kusuo even went as far as hooking her up with someone else but the relationship abruptly failed. She later develops a crush on Kaidou after he saved her from the unwanted attention of some guys at the beach.

characters.name: Chisato Mera
characters.description:
Chisato Mera is a classmate of Kusuo's. She works part time in Cafe Mami as a waitress.

(Source: Saiki Kusuo no Sai Nan Wikia)

characters.name: Kusuke Saiki
characters.description:
__Height:__ 179 cm

Kusuke is Kusuo's older brother and a super genius who likes to invent machines/devices. Kusuke is prideful and competitive when it comes to Kusuo. He would have done anything to win against him when they were kids, but he would always lose against his little brother. This led to him being addicted to playing/fighting with Kusuo.

characters.name: Anpu
characters.description:
Anpu shows up a couple of times and is also part of the “everyone else loves me so why doesn’t Saiki” brigade. After being saved by Kusuo, he starts to visit his house to make Kusuo pet him. He once got Kusuo (disguised as Sai) to aid him in trying to woo a female cat Pushi. Later on, Kusuo pets him after Anpu saved him from a chasing cockroach.

(Source: Saiki Kusuo no Psi Nan Wikia)

characters.name: Kazuya Ikemi
characters.description: He was first introduced as Michael (Mr. Ike) by Uryoku when Kusuo runs into them performing a street show. After failing their act, Ike wasn't given the money he was promised because they didn't earn anything from passersby. He continued to be Uryoku's assistant afterwards.

characters.name: Kouta Nakanishi
characters.description:
He's a homeless magician that first appeared playing tricks in the street with his partner Michael. Basically Chouno goes in and out of being a homeless failure and a semi-successful magician. Saiki ends up helping him out every once and a while just on a whim, but doesn’t think very highly of him. Chouno has seen some of Saiki's powers, but thinks it's just stage magic. Because of this, he treats Saiki like a veteran illusionist and even calls him "master". At his most successful, Chouno had a weird comedy magic act going on.

(Source: Saiki Kusuo no Psi Nan Wikia)

characters.name: Makoto Teruhashi
characters.description:
A top idol and Kokomi's older brother. He has a serious sister complex and hates it when Saiki is near her.

(Source: Wikipedia)

characters.name: Kumagoro Saiki
characters.description: Kumagoro Saiki is the husband of Kumi Saiki, the father of Kurumi, the father-in-law of Kuniharu Saiki and grandfather of Kusuo Saiki and Kusuke Saiki. Kumagoro is a grumpy old man who hates Kusuo's father Kuniharu and loves his daughter Kurumi. He is actually a tsundere who truly wants to dote on his grandchildren.

characters.name: Kumi Saiki
characters.description: Kumi Saiki is the wife of Kumagoro Saiki, Kurumi Saiki's mother, the mother-in-law of Kuniharu Saiki, and grandmother of Kusuo Saiki and Kusuke Saiki. Despite her old age, Kumi keeps the style of a modern teenage Japanese girl, wearing clothes sexy for her style and a skirt shorter than her knees.

characters.name: Yuuta Iridatsu
characters.description: A  neighborhood boy. He first met Saiki Kusuo after his balloon got blown up high and the latter caught it for him. He got attached to Kusuo and Kokomi in the later chapters. He is one of the few aware that Saiki has powers, but doesn't know he's a psychic.

characters.name: Metori Saiko
characters.description: Metori Saiko is the scion of the top-notch Saiko Conglomerate. He later transfers to PK Academy after falling in love with Kokomi when he was in the city. His defining traits are being rich and smug.

characters.name: Takahashi
characters.description: A frequent side character. He is somehow a delinquent with as seen when he fakes being sick to skip the School Year Opening Ceremony and then puts the blame on Nendō and Kusuo, and gets himself into convoluted schemes with his circle of friends; but overall he just is a nuisance to deal with.

characters.name: Midori Nendou
characters.description: Riki Nendou's mother.

characters.name: Matsuzaki
characters.description: PK Academy's gym teacher and guidance counselor.

characters.name: Riki Takeuchi
characters.description: Riki Nendo's deceased father.

characters.name: Narrator
characters.description:
This character page is set to represent and list all narrators, which haven't been given a visual representation of themselves in their respective work. 

Please add other narrator characters, which were given a visual representation of themselves, separately from this narrator page.
